
set(OPENBLAS OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off OPENBLAS for Limbo")
set(INSTALL_LIMBO OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off installation for Limbo")
set(GENERATE_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off documentation for Limbo")
set(ENABLE_TEST OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off test for Limbo")
add_subdirectory(Limbo)

add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/utility)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/place_io)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/dct)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/pin_pos)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/move_boundary)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/electric_potential)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/hpwl)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/weighted_average_wirelength)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/logsumexp_wirelength)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/pin_weight_sum)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/macro_legalize)
add_subdirectory(DREAMPlace/dreamplace/ops/abacus_legalize)
